My Projects

Some of my projects...

GitHub Explorer more_vert Html | Sass | JavaScript | React.js
Demo Source Code
Descriptionclose

Small application involving Firebase GitHub OAuth login to acces to public and private repositories.

GitHub Api v3 returns data about user repository Watchers, Forks Count, Stargazers, Issues details, README.MD, which languages were used etc.

Government Data more_vert Html | Sass | JavaScript | React.js
Demo Source Code
Descriptionclose

ProPublica Api provides real-time acces to Congressional data from the House of Representatives, the Senate and the Library of the Congress.

It Includes details about members, votes and other aspects of congressional activity from United States which is displayed in tabular applying custom filters.

MakeUp Beauty Store more_vert Html | Sass | JavaScript | Vue.js
Demo Source Code
Descriptionclose

Using Vue CLI without VueX, fetching beauty products displaying them in multiple components such as a Home, Details page with the selected item and 3 relevant suggestions for the selected item.

It also includes Categories page where you can see all the items and filter them by dropdown or search input as well as a Random component which brings a random item with a button to get another random button and styling up with Sass and Materialize cards.

Youth Soccer League more_vert Html | Css | Materialize Css
Demo Source Code
Descriptionclose

My first project using only Html, Css and later Materialze Css where informations about a Youth Soccer League club are displayed in multiple pages to inform visitors and parents about the game schedules, locations via Google Maps, Sign Up forms and details about matches.
